name: Knights Of Realm game demo
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fantasy, turn based project. Procedural generated map 500x500.  Development is paused for now.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

update 1.00.0540 turn based game, demo

*Gameplay elements in this version: *random map 500x500, woods, grassland, mountains, swamp, lakes *start with 4 units *slain demons, snakes, wolfs, skeletons and get exp points to fight stronger enemies *get exp and health visiting villages *get exp and additional units visiting castles *travel by rafts *only skeletons fight back when players unit is close *no enemy moves

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Some controls: move map - mouse\ arrows keys, check grid - lmb, uncheck grid - rmb, spacebar\green arrow icon- focus on player\next unit, tab - on\off grid, ~ - fog of war, m - music on\off, c - clouds on\off, enter\ timer icon - restore move\attack points\end turn, esc - menu, del key in menu -default configuration\ delete save

data1 folder (fonts, icons), data2 folder (sounds), data3 folder (map, units and settings files), data4 folder (images), resources folder, Project1.vbp, Project1.vbw, Form1.frm, Form1.frx, Form2.frm, Module1.bas, readme.txt
